captions.text:
I'm gonna, hey--
- [Blonde Man] Oh, oh, I'm--

So the Irish guy's like,
"I built this," no.
I totally forgot to write her back.
- I wasn't, no, I was looking at...

- [Man on Phone] You're
lookin' really sexy today.
- I love that dress on you.
- [Man on Phone] I'm on my phone.

- And the girl was
apparently like, "What the--"
- I think I told you that story--

- [Woman] That was me.
- [Jen] That was you.
You were the girl in that story.
Oh, that is not for you.
- Alright, so have a good weekend.

- It was great to see you.
- [Jen] Alright, bye.
- [Man with Glasses] Cool, see you later.

title: How Many Of These Awkward Moments Have You Experienced?

comments.author: the monkey

comments.text:
I was visiting a pier and they had a water ride and I was looking for the 
entrance. However, they also had a splash area with a yellow cone alerting 
people that the floor was slippery. I walked into the splash area with my 
friend thinking it was the entrance to the ride, but once I realized it 
wasn't I left. Thing is, the ground had tons of water scattered amongst the 
deck. I had managed to get my shoes wet and then, while leaving, I slipped 
and caught myself with my arm, but spraining my wrist in front of about 500 
people. So I threw my arm up and casually ran out of the place towards the 
only comfort available, the food court. Suffice to say I didn't enjoy that 
trip. I didn't even know my wrist was sprung until the day after, so I was 
just walking around riding dangerous rides with a sprained wrist, not 
realizing that the searing pain probably meant there was something wrong.﻿

comments.text:
I was at the pool one time and thought I spotted my dad with his back 
turned to me. Being the childish person I am, I just jumped on his back and 
we fell into the water while I laughed uncontrollably... only to realize it 
wasn't my dad but a man with similar looking swimming trunks... Better yet, 
he was with his kids and wife. They were all just staring at me.... I don't 
think I've ever swam faster in my life.﻿

1) That awkward moment when you say something embaressing in the class room 
because every body is noisy, and when you say it, they all stop talking...
2) When this kid in your class makes a hilarious joke, everybody laughs, 
and when they stop, your the only one still laughing..
3) When everybody is taking a test, and its silent,and than your stomach 
makes the dying whale sound....



Like if any of these things every happened to you xD﻿
